I'm interested in using Verus on my desktop. How can I get a Verus address on my desktop?

**AI Assistant:**
You can get a Verus address on your desktop by downloading Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux, or Linux ARM from the Verus website. **AI Assistant:**
Verus Mobile is a fantastic way to manage your Verus address on the go. One of the key benefits is that it allows you to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) within the application. This makes it easy to move assets between chains. Additionally, it enables MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions, which can save you money and hassle. Plus, it's just convenient to have your Verus address with you wherever you go!
How can I get a Verus address on my desktop?

You can get a Verus address on your desktop by downloading Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux, or Linux ARM from the Verus website. This will allow you to run a full node in native mode and experience all the features of the Verus protocol.

# Get a Verus address There are a few ways to get a Verus address on desktop and on mobile. ## Verus Mobile Download Verus Mobile from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/en/app/verus-mobile/id6447361908) or [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US) Use Verus Mobile to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) all within the application. And use it for MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions: [more on Verus DeFi](/sendcurrency) ## Verus Desktop Download Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux or Linux ARM [here](https://verus.io/wallet). Run a full node (native mode) to experience all protocol features.
